about_the_game:
If you are interested in the background details, worldbuilding, character designs, and more of the game,
you are welcome to purchase our official art book, which has a whopping 300 pages!
In this visually stunning art book, you can delve into detailed information about your favorite protagonist (or antagonist?)
including character background settings, visual analysis, weapon designs, concept sketches, and more;
The art book also includes scene breakdowns and showcases from the game;
opening animation analysis;
story background worldviews and timeline organization;

Spoiler Warning: The art book contains game story content, so it is recommended to view it after playing!
